title: In ranked game dced me but let me requeue
body: Was playing jax top got dced so i left the match to rejoin  but it only let me requeue for another game.

replies.body: Hmmmm that game might have entirely crashed server side if you never had the opportunity to reconnect to it. In those cases, you won't actually receive any penalties for having left the match and you'll be perfectly fine to requeue!
